# Resize Tiles
<!--
@name: Resize Tiles
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Set the width and height of the tiles in pixel for a specific view, does not affect the original tiles
## Parameters

- **viewName&dollar;**: Name of the view
- **width**: Width of the tiles in pixel
- **height**: Height of the tiles in pixel
---
<p align="center"><img valign="middle" width="76px" src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/en/image001.png" /></p>
